body:
According to the "Source code organization" section in [Developer notes](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/developer-notes.md), `using namespace` should be avoided. This commit removes all uses of `using namespace <xxx>` in all source files, including test and bench related files, ~~as well as the `univalue` library~~.

I have already done a same-binaries check (rerun on 2bfef03 commit) which passes:

```Bash
$ ../bitcoin-maintainer-tools/build-for-compare.py d04aebaec7bbf4095bd4f6a715eb6ee834857115 2bfef03102cd5063e0a7b8d30f71d2e6bf7e0900 --executables "src/bitcoind,src/bitcoin-cli,src/bitcoin-tx" --patches "stripbuildinfo.patch,stripbuildinfo-without-using-ns.patch"
[...]
>>> [do_build] Copying object files...
>>> [do_build] Performing basic analysis pass...
>>> [do_build] Use these commands to compare results:
>>> [do_build] $ sha256sum /tmp/compare/*.stripped
>>> [do_build] $ git diff -W --word-diff /tmp/compare/d04aebaec7bbf4095bd4f6a715eb6ee834857115 /tmp/compare/2bfef03102cd5063e0a7b8d30f71d2e6bf7e0900
$ sha256sum /tmp/compare/*.stripped

$ git diff -W --word-diff /tmp/compare/d04aebaec7bbf4095bd4f6a715eb6ee834857115 /tmp/compare/2bfef03102cd5063e0a7b8d30f71d2e6bf7e0900

```

I am open to ideas to make this less unwieldly if desired, such as splitting into multiple separate PRs.
